name: Arck Interactive
description:
Arck Interactive is a boutique digital agency focused on helping organizations create innovative web and mobile platforms.
Since 2009, we've provided product design, development, marketing, managed hosting, and strategic services to clients who range from early-stage technology startups to multinational financial enterprises.
 
Our work powers Gatorade’s Athlete Reporting Platform, Infusionsoft/Keap's CRM, World Bank’s internal and external social networks, Botworx' AI Marketing Bot network, John Wiley & Son’s faculty network, University of Michigan’s Health Modeling Platform, Executive Network’s business intelligence platform and social CRM, an educational learning network for Loyola High School, a commercial social networking application called “The Vine”, and many others.
 
We are open-source enthusiasts. Our developers are key contributors to several popular development frameworks, including Elgg, a social networking framework used in many of our community projects.
Service Offerings
Web and Mobile Product Strategy
Prototyping, Concept and MVP Development
Full-Stack Web Application Development (Node, Express, Angular, React, Vue, Laravel/PHP, Codeignitor, Djanjo, YI, Elgg, etc.)
UI / UX Design, Strategy
Mobile Product Design
iOS App Development
Android App Development
Hybrid App Development (React Native, Xamarin, Ionic, etc.)
Managed Cloud Hosting via ArckCloud (IaaS, PaaS, bare metal)
AI / Bot Development
Quality Assurance & Testing
Mobile Backend Engineering (Google App Engine, Firebase, Deployd, Firehose, Socket.IO, Atmosphere, etc.)
Variation and A/B Testing
